name: Many Directions
description:
Game submitted to ScoreSpace Jam #10

Theme: DIRECTION!

In this game you control many arrows at the same time, each one pointing to a different direction.

There are 5 different levels, each one with a different Scoreboard.

Objective:

Collect all stars as fast as possible.

Controls:

- Left: change direction of all arrows clockwise
- Right: change direction of all arrows counterclockwise
